column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Lydia - Thank you for the great
column2: comprehensive review. We also appreciate the great photos you took. I'm glad you enjoyed our ramen and small plates. We offer Ramen Seasoning
column3: Gyoza Sauce and Hot Sauce on all of the tables. And we can always provide more spicy sauce that the chefs use to flavor our ramens for a nominal charge -- it's akin to asking for sour cream in a Tex-Mex restaurant. We appreciate your kind words
column4: and we hope you'll come back again soon.
